ing: 1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "This is great as a sweet compliment to a meal.  It works well for pot lucks."
ins: In a medium bowl, mix together the cream cheese and sugar until smooth and fluffy. Stir in the whipped topping. Fold in the bananas, mandarin oranges and raspberries. Transfer to a 9x13 inch baking dish, cover, and freeze for at least 4 hours. Remove from the freezer 1/2 hour prior to serving.
